#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main() {
    int  t;cin>>t;
    while(t--){
        int n;cin>>n;
        int A[n];
        int i,j;
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
            scanf("%d",&A[i]);
            
        int diff[n];
        diff[0]=0;
        for(i=1;i<n;i++)
        diff[i]=A[i]-A[i-1];
        
        int dp[n];
        dp[0]=0;
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        dp[i]=max(dp[i-1]+diff[i],diff[i]);
        
        int profit=0;
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
            if(profit<dp[i])
            profit=dp[i];
            
        cout<<profit<<endl;
           
    }
}
